name: Slendy Something...
description:
Slenderman hasn't been popular for a while now, and he's not very happy about it. He's decided to take control of many entities that have been receiving attention from the public eye in attempts to regain his place in the spotlight.

This game is a collaboration between Dave Microwaves Games and myself that was created in about a month or so. There are tons of maps, tons of easter eggs & extras and two endings in total.

Will you be able to stop Slenderman from being trendy once again!?
